name: ABetterMe
0:
”Alexa, open A Better Me”
”Alexa, launch A Better Me”
”Alexa, start A Better Me”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a better me
des:
Want to go on a fulfilling journey to develop priceless qualities to help you deal with life’s challenges and have a positive effect on the world? Want to improve your memory and listening skills while you're at it?

Of course, you do! 

Ask Alexa to open “A Better Me,” and you’ll be guided from there. Listen to the true stories of outstanding people in the Bible, then answer simple questions to help you remember them and learn the modern-day lessons they have for you. After learning about a quality the person was known for, you’ll be helped to work on developing it.

Check in every morning for a new scriptural thought based on that quality. You’ll be helped to consider and apply it as you go about your day. Check in again every night to be guided on how to reflect on your efforts to apply the scripture that day and to figure out where you may need to improve. 

Stories and qualities will become unlocked as you progress in your journey. You must complete each day’s scriptural consideration and reflection before you can move on to the next.

A Better Me shows how the Bible — the world's oldest and most translated and distributed book — is practical for modern-day living in a way that's fun, relatable, and appealing to everybody, regardless of their circumstances. If you have a personal copy, feel free to look up the scriptures as you go along.

Featuring music from Pixabay artists: MadiRFAN, PianoAmor, Lesfm, virtuosound, JuliusH, NaturesEye, GabrielDouglas, Mepa Melson, JosepMonter, Lofi hour, chillmore, joy921111, AntipodeanWriter, and xptlmusic.

Cover photo: Jaime Dantas (Unsplash)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
